mapper.select: select p.* from user_role_relation ar left join role r on ar.role_id = r.id left join role_permission_relation rp on r.id = rp.role_id left join permission p on rp.permission_id=p.id where ar.user_id = #{userId} and p.id is not null

SELECT p.* FROM user_role_relation ar LEFT JOIN role r ON ar.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN role_permission_relation rp ON r.id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.id WHERE ar.user_id = #{userId} AND p.id IS NOT NULL AND p.id NOT IN ( SELECT p.id FROM user_permission_relation pr LEFT JOIN permission p ON pr.permission_id = p.id WHERE pr.type = - 1 AND pr.user_id = #{userId} ) UNION SELECT p.* FROM user_permission_relation pr LEFT JOIN permission p ON pr.permission_id = p.id WHERE pr.type = 1 AND pr.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT ur.id id, ur.create_time createTime, ur.`name` `name`, ur.url url, ur.description description, ur.category_id categoryId FROM user_role_relation ar LEFT JOIN role r ON ar.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN role_resource_relation rrr ON r.id = rrr.role_id LEFT JOIN resource ur ON ur.id = rrr.resource_id WHERE ar.user_id = #{userId} AND ur.id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ur.id
SELECT DISTINCT ar.user_id FROM role_resource_relation rr LEFT JOIN user_role_relation ar ON rr.role_id = ar.role_id WHERE rr.resource_id=#{resourceId}
